supportFaqA1.message:
Depending on your chosen provider/model, you may be hitting token rate limits per minute (TPM). OpenAI has very low rate limits until you spend at least $50 in credits. Anthropic has higher base limits. You can check your rate limits at: https://platform.openai.com/settings/organization/limits, https://console.anthropic.com/settings/limits or https://ai.google.dev/gemini-api/docs/rate-limits

You can try switching to a different model with higher limits, use Gemini or Anthropic which have higher base limits, or disable some n8nChat tools that use a lot of tokens like the 'Node Library Access' tool which can sometimes use 10,000 - 30,000 tokens in a single request.

supportFaqA2.message: Go to the 'Chat' tab in the n8nChat settings menu and disable tools you don't need. Some tools like 'Node Library Access' can use 10,000 - 30,000 tokens in a single request.

supportFaqA3.message: Make sure you refresh the page; if you just installed n8nChat, the page may not have had a chance to load it. Refresh the page and try activating again. Also, check if any ad blocker extensions you have installed are blocking n8nChat access. Some ad blockers prevent n8nChat from being injected into the page. Also, check your Privacy and Security settings in your browser. If your 'Safe Browsing' setting is set to 'Enhanced protection', this can prevent the n8nChat extension from working properly; try 'Standard protection' instead.

supportFaqA4.message: n8nChat is now completely free and open source. All features are available to all users without any subscription or payment required.

supportFaqA5.message: n8nChat supports multiple AI providers: Google (Gemini), OpenAI, Anthropic (Claude), and Local LLM servers. You can configure your preferred provider and API keys in the settings. Local LLM support allows you to use models running on your own computer (Ollama, LM Studio, etc.) without any API keys.

supportFaqA6.message: You can join the n8nChat community on Discord: https://discord.gg/kz56JZqgtN or if you prefer to contact me directly, you can send an email to info@willscreative.com

supportFaqQ1.message: I sent my message but it seems to be thinking and/or not responding to me, what's the issue?

supportFaqQ2.message: How can I reduce token usage?

supportFaqQ3.message: I'm on an n8n workflow page and I'm activating n8nChat, but the chat box UI never appears, what's the issue?

supportFaqQ4.message: Do I need to pay for n8nChat?

supportFaqQ5.message: Which AI providers does n8nChat support?

supportFaqQ6.message: I have feature suggestions and/or need additional help, where can I get support?
